ygData.subject: Re: Jig and Mana Regeneration
ygData.msgSnippet: I am fairly positive that a recent patch message said that bards were immune to any sort of enhanced mana regeneration... Lulen ... From: Garramone, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
I am fairly positive that a recent patch message said that bards were immune
to any sort of enhanced mana regeneration...

Lulen

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 23, 1999 11:36
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Jig and Mana Regeneration


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>
> > My question is tho, will this increase the bards mana regen
> > at 42nd level.
> >
> > Any high level bard wanna give this a try and report back.
> >
>
> I can't test it yet because they have not put our level 43 song up for
sale
> yet, so I can't use mana. But good idea to try.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 46 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
